title: Lower Priority Queue
body:
Does the lower priority queue stack permanently, or does it decay overtime? 
         eg. If you get placed in a 20 minute lower priority queue, then play 100 games with no AFKS or leaves, then you leave one game and get placed into a lower priority queue, does it automatically go to 20 minutes or does it calculate your queue time by the amount of times you have AFKed in the past few games?

replies.body: I would assume it just gets (amount of leaves X the amount of regular minutes for leaving a champ select) = your punishment
